text_block_list.text: A little while after I became Maruzensky's trainer— The day of her debut race had finally arrived.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aww, trainer! You came all the way down here to see me off? Hmhm, thanks.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aww, trainer! You came all the way down here to see me off? Hmhm, thanks.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Sound as a pound♪ It's been a beautiful day after all.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Besides, there's something special about feeling the wind on the race track. Now that I'm here I'm going to make the most of it!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well then, I'm offff!
She smiled and laughed as she always does, and put her skills on full display in the race.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: —Approaching the fourth corner, Maruzensky leads! She's had the lead from the start and shows no signs of giving it up!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Fuu, fuu, fuu…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … There's still more in my legs!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky speeds up further! She's leaving everyone so far behind they probably can't even see her anymore!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ha, hah, ha…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky crosses the line with second place nowhere in sight!! How's that for a debut!?
—A second later, thunderous cheers erupted from the stands.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Sorry to keep you, trainer♪ Let's go home—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm all good now, trainer♪ Let's go home—

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It's here… the day's finally here!! It's time for your debut!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Yes, trainer! I'm going to win this race! It will be my first step to becoming a Triple Crown horsegirl!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That's the spirit! I know you can do it! Show 'em what we've been training for!!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Yeeeeaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: What? Oh, no, it's just…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Hey, once we get back to the school we'll be done for the day, right? Do you have any plans after?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Hey, once we get back to the school we'll be done for the day, right? Do you have any plans after?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: If you're free… maybe we can go for a drive together?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yeah. What do you think? Up for it? I'll come get you then! Can you wait for me at the gate when we get back?
And so, as I waited on her at the gate…
(Vrrrroovrroooooom!! Screeech…)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hi, trainer♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hi, trainer♪
… A low, bright red car pulled up, and out stepped Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My, what's the blank stare for, something happen?
choice_data_list: That's a hell of a car…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Isn't she just～!? Amazing, right!? This is my buddy; Tacchan!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Her slender, nifty body and the low roar of her engine…… They call these scissor doors, isn't it charming how they open vertically～!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Of course her ride's great too! Hop in, hop in, you'll have a great time!
Thus invited, I boarded Maruzensky's "buddy"…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Don't you love this acceleration! The scenery rushing by? But this is where Tacchan really starts to shine～!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: No worries, no worries, I'll obey the traffic rules! I'm just… pushing them a little!!
(Vrrrrvrrrooooooom!!)
—I had an… extraordinarily thrilling time.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oooooooh, that felt so good～…! Our carefree drive ends at the beach… oh, how romantic!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: What'd you think, trainer? My Tacchan must have been a heavenly ride!
choice_data_list: I think I did see heaven a few times…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: How was it, Trainer? My Tacchan must have been a heavenly ride!
choice_data_list: I think I did see heaven a few times…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Mmm, mmm! I'm glad you had a good time♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: —Driving's great isn't it? When you let the speed take over, it's like you become the wind, and you feel like you can go anywhere.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Being able to enjoy that feeling, that joy, with my own body… I'm truly happy to be born a horsegirl.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: The pleasure of going faster than the wind, feeling it rush by with my whole body… There's nothing else like it!
choice_data_list: You really like to run, don't you?
You really like to run, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yeah, of course! …But you know, that's really it, to me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I don't have any of those… dazzling dreams or lofty goals, like everyone else…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Don't get me wrong, I love to run and race. I just—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: When I'm in a serious competition like today, where everyone's dreams collide… I can't help but think "am I out of place?".

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Dearie me, I'm getting all soppy! We've finally gone on our first drive together, I can't be doing this!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Dearie me, look at me getting all soppy! We've finally gone on our first drive together, I can't be doing this!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, yeah! Since we're at the beach, why don't we play tag? You know, like in those trendy dramas!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'll be running away. —Ehehehe, come and catch me if you ca～aan♪
"I don't have any of those dreams or goals" …On that day, I felt I caught a glimpse of her true self she keeps hidden beneath that mature smile.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ehehehe, ahahahaha♪
(Thudududud!!)
choice_data_list: …Hang on, there's no way I'm catching you!
…Hang on, there's no way I'm catching you!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aww don't say that! You can do it, trainer～♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aww don't say that! Show me your best effort～♪
